message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS 

This paper deals with machine learning algorithms and their vulnerability to poisoning attacks, which are common topics in the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), cryptography and security (cs.CR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CV), and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper proposes a novel attack formulation that considers the effect of the attack on hyperparameters, which is a technique that can be applied to various machine learning algorithms and thus can be relevant to multiple sub-categories. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.CV, and cs.DS, in descending order of likelihood.
